name: ttt-discord-bot
description: A Discord bot for automatic mute/unmute control in Trouble in Terrorist Town (Garry's Mod) with statistics tracking and web dashboard.
author: Oudstand

scripts.build:favicon: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const data = fs.readFileSync('public/favicon.ico', 'base64'); fs.writeFileSync('favicon-embedded.ts', 'export const faviconBase64 = \"' + data + '\";');"
scripts.build: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:favicon && bun run build:exe
